briefTitle: Sofosbuvir/Velpatasvir Fixed-Dose Combination in Adults With Chronic HCV Infection
officialTitle: An Open Label Study of Sofosbuvir/GS-5816 Fixed-Dose Combination in Subjects With Chronic HCV Infection
summary: The primary objectives of this study are to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of treatment with sofosbuvir/velpatasvir (SOF/VEL) in participants with chronic genotype 1, 2, 4, 6 or indeterminate HCV infection who received placebo in the Gilead-sponsored study GS-US-342-1138.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks After Discontinuation of Therapy (SVR12)
